name: Fiery Sanctum's Protection
description: When Fiery Sanctum Field is on the field and Dehya is on standby on your side, then when your active character takes damage: Damage taken is reduced by 1, and if Dehya has at least 7 HP, then she receives 1 Piercing DMG (once per round).
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When $[C113093] is on the field and $[A1309] is on standby on your side, then when your active character takes damage:</color> Damage taken is reduced by 1, and if $[A1309] has at least 7 HP, then she receives 1 $[K5] (once per round).
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Fiery Sanctum Field is on the field and Dehya is on standby on your side, then when your active character takes damage:</color> Damage taken is reduced by 1, and if Dehya has at least 7 HP, then she receives 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> (once per round).
